# hasLyrics

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the song has lyrics available in the catalog. If true, the song has lyrics available; otherwise, it doesn’t.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasLyrics: Bool { get }
```
title: hasLyrics
